scripts.publ: yarn workspaces foreach npm publish --tolerate-republish --access public
scripts.binary-build-windows: cd ./binary && CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../packages/windows/binary
scripts.binary-build-linux: cd ./binary && CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build  -o ../packages/linux/binary
scripts.binary-build-mac: cd ./binary && CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build  -o ../packages/darwin/binary
scripts.bbc: yarn binary-build-windows && yarn binary-build-linux && yarn binary-build-mac
